Package managers

Class BookingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.BookingManager
  • public class BookingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the entity labelled Booking. Contains the logic to link Booking to other classes.
    Since:
    2019-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    balad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BookingManager()
      Checks if array list of Booking objects is null.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Booking addReceipt​(java.lang.String cinemaID, int showtimeID, double price)
      Adds the booking details to the records and updates external csv file.
      Booking getBookingByID​(java.lang.String bookingTID)
      Iterates through records to compare given TID against list of TID already present.
      void listTop5ByTicketSales()
      Prints out the top 5 movies in terms of the number of tickets sold.
      void printReceipt​(java.lang.String TID)
      Prints out the booking receipt.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingManager

        public BookingManager()
        Checks if array list of Booking objects is null. If null, data fom the csv file is written to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • getBookingByID

        public Booking getBookingByID​(java.lang.String bookingTID)
        Iterates through records to compare given TID against list of TID already present.
        Parameters:
        bookingTID - Unique transaction ID of the booking done.
        Returns:
        Booking that is present in the records.

      • addReceipt

        public Booking addReceipt​(java.lang.String cinemaID,
                          int showtimeID,
                          double price)
        Adds the booking details to the records and updates external csv file.
        Parameters:
        cinemaID - Unique identification key for the cinema showing the chosen movie.
        showtimeID - Unique identification key for the showtime chosen.
        price - Total price of the tickets bought by the user.
        Returns:
        Transaction ID of the booking that was completed.

      • printReceipt

        public void printReceipt​(java.lang.String TID)
        Prints out the booking receipt.
        Parameters:
        TID - Unique transaction ID of the booking done.

      • listTop5ByTicketSales

        public void listTop5ByTicketSales()
        Prints out the top 5 movies in terms of the number of tickets sold.
